content: in this court case the belluno court made several decisions firstly it determined that the plaintiff is entitled to a claim of €71618 plus interest and rejected the counterclaim proposed by the respondent the court also dissolved the community property between the parties the plaintiffs property was assigned to a courtappointed expert witness based on their report the court addressed claims for reimbursement of expenses related to paternal succession and caring for the mother ruling in favor of the defendant on the former and the plaintiff on the latter the court partially granted the claim for reimbursement of funeral expenses the defendant is owed a reimbursement of 22868 for paying inheritance tax the court also addressed the division of communal real estate accepting the first project proposed by the courtappointed expert witness the court concluded by ordering the necessary assignment of the property and finalizing the costs the final decision was made on january 8 2019 and filed with the court registry on the same day
